attributes.action: CCC - Build a cresh/play area within each gym located in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
This will be beneficial to many individuals along side all companies willing to participate.

 JOBS
• Generates more jobs within the company
• Job availability for those with childcare qualifications 


HEALTH (mental & physical)
• Allow individuals to focus on their health and fitness 
• Sanity - for those who need it most 

CHILDCARE:
• Child located in same building as parent 
• Children supervised by trained/qualified staff 

COMPANY BENEFITS: 
• More money generated within the gym companies
attributes.background:
((CCC - Chesscas Cosy Corner))

To build a play area within ALL gyms located in UK to enable parents/single parents/careers/siblings/foster careers the opportunity to maintain their health and fitness along side their busy life of work and parenting.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to provide a creche or play area are a matter for individual gyms, not the UK Government or Parliament.
